name: autoline
0:
”"Alexa, open the living room blind"”
”"Alexa, close the living room blind"”
”"Alexa, open the Curtains"”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
It is a home automation system that allows anyone to remotely control blind curtains in the house with mobile voice control.
After installing our bridge equipment, connecting to the Internet, downloading AUTOLINE APP, and linking with Alexa for voice control.
Controllable equipment can control blinds, curtains, Venetian blinds and external shading systems.
